attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. The Honda BR-V is a spacious, safe and comfortable SUV. Ideal for large families thanks to its 7-seater layout. Access to the rear bench is made easy thanks to a simple, one-touch, fold-and-tumble action on the middle row. Should additional seating not be required, the rearmost bench folds and tumbles away to free up additional luggage space. This 2021 model comes with full service history and balance of factory warranty.

Offer includes free gift of your choice from one of the following options:
- Smash & Grab tint
- Auto Armor ( 2 in 1)
- R1000 fuel voucher
